name: DIGGING SIMULATOR 2020
description:
You have a simple mission, dig with grace and power, seek with a sharp eye, shape the world as it has shaped you. Your strength, speed and wit will decide the hole you dig. 

  • Virtual Reality digging game - (currently available on quest)
  • Strike terrain to dig and explore
  • Collect treasure and unlock the depths below
  • Discover new tools to make new holes, or power up old ones
  • VR trackers mean velocity and direction create your hole

This is a simple vertical slice of a concept around focusing on 'VR Native' interactions (like digging and grabbing). It is at the point where I am happy to share, so please give feedback, which will help me polish it, explore new directions, and decide whether it is worth developing.

Please send photos and videos of your best holes, thanks!
